145027.<center>闘戦士 <cs_pchero>。\n汝が たどりし道を 今ここに:
<cs_pchero>. The path you have
taken has brought you here once again.

145028.<center>恐れることなく どんな困難にも立ち向かう\n勇気の心。:
A heart of courage to face any challenge
without fear.

145029.<center>すべてを愛し 許す\n慈愛の心。:
A heart of kindness that loves and forgives
all.

145030.<center>物事を深く考え 真理に到達する\n英知の心。:
A heart of wisdom that deeply contemplates
and reaches for the truth.

145031.<center>どんな苦境に立たされても あきらめない\n希望の心。:
A heart of hope that never gives up, no matter
the odds.

145032.<center>４つの心を 糧として\n正義の心を 解き放て。:
With these four hearts to sustain you, it is
time to unleash the heart of justice.

145034.「……ふう なんとか 間に合ったようですね。: ...Phew, we made it just in time.

145035.「私としたことが こんな大事な時に\n 遅刻するなんて……。:
To think we would be late for such a crucial
moment!

145036.「ふふ。\n 聖光教主さまに お会いできるとあって\n みんな 興奮しているみた:
Hmm hmm...it seems we're all a bit excited
to finally meet the Light Lord.

145038.「我ら 勇気 慈愛 英知 希望……\n ４つの心を司る 光導使なり。:
We are the guiding light of the four hearts...
Courage, kindness, wisdom, and hope.

145039.「我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n 選ばれし闘戦士を 導かん。:
We exchange our vows with our master, the
Light Lord, and guide the one chosen.

145040.「勇気 慈愛 英知 希望の心を示し\n 正義の心を宿すは 闘戦士 <pc>なり。:
Courage, kindness, wisdom, hope, and justice
lay within the heart of <pc>.

145041.「闘戦士 <pc>よ。\n いざ 聖光を呼び覚ます光芒となれ！:
O <pc>... Arise now, and become
the radiance that reawakens the sacred
light!

145043.「やあ はじめまして～。僕は 聖光教主。\n きみが 勇敢なる闘戦士 <pc>だ:
Hey, a pleasure to meet you. I am the Light
Lord. Your courage tells me that you must
be <pc>, right?

145044.「きみの活躍は 彼女たちを通して見ていたよ～。\n よくぞ 僕を呼び起こしてくれ:
I've been watching you closely through these young ladies. You've done quite splendid to awaken me. That righteous heart of yours
has truly resonated with my own.

145045.「さっそくだけど きみが手にした 正義の心で\n 最後のチカラの解放を 行なうと:
So, without further ado...with the heart of
justice within your grasp, let's unleash
the final part of your power.

145046.「っと その前に。\n ミーミ！ ナズナ！ メナー！ ミナナ！:
...But first things first! Meemi! Nazuna!
Menna! Minana!

145047.「……お会いしとうございました 聖光教主さま。: ...We are overjoyed to see you, Light Lord.

145048.「あたしも！ あたしも！！ \n ずーっと 会いたかったの！\n ねえ 聖光教主:
Me too, me too! I've been waiting to meet you
for sooo long! Please! Please let me hug you
and feel that fuzzy fur!!

145049.「ちょっと ナズナ！ やめてよ。\n 聖光教主さまに もふもふするのは 私よ。:
Wait, Nazuna! Stop that! I'M the one who's
supposed to feel his fuzzy fur!

145050.「ふ ふたりとも ずるいです……！\n 私だって もふもふしたいです……！: Y...you two are so unfair! I wanna do it, too!

145051.「ははっ。きみたちは いつも元気だなあ～。\n でも その前にやらなきゃいけない:
Haha...you're all so energetic... Before that,
though, there's something I have to do.
You'll all help me, won't you?

145053.「うん いい子たちだ。よ～しよし。\n それじゃ 準備はいいかい？:
Good, that's my girls! Okay, okay...
Now, are you all ready?

145054.「おどろいたようだね～。\n 今までのは 彼女たちの仮の姿で\n こっちが 本来:
You seem quite surprised. What you've been
seeing up until now was just their temporary
forms. This is what they really are.

145055.「きみは 虚無の邪神の手先に 封印されていた\n ミナナを 救ってくれたね？:
You saved Minana from being sealed away by
that Dark Deity's minion, right?

145056.「かつて 奴らと戦っていたとき\n 彼女たちは このとおり 僕の聖具として\n:
When I fought them a long time ago, these
girls lent me their strength as sacred
artifacts, just like these.

145057.「……虚無の邪神の眷属は あの戦い以来 \n 息を潜めているけど 奴らが ふたた:
That Dark Deity's minions have been keeping
quiet since that battle, but it's only a
matter of time before they show up again.

145058.「日増しに 強くなるアストルティアの魔瘴……。 \n 大いなる闇の根源と呼ばれる:
The demon miasma in Astoltia grows stronger by the day... The source of it all is a being called the Great Source of Darkness. You knew
that too, right?

145059.「大いなる闇の根源……それは\n 創世の女神ルティアナさまと対峙し\n アストル:
The Great Source of Darknessーthe supreme
evil that opposes Lutiana, the Goddess of
Creation...it seeks to destroy Astoltia.

145060.「きみには その真名を知る権利がある。 \n 今こそ 告げよう 呪われし名を……:
You have the right to know its true name.
I will tell you just what that accursed name
is...

145061.「異界滅神 ジャゴヌバ。 \n ……それこそが このアストルティアに\n 仇なす:
Jagonuba, the Otherworldly Obliterator...that
is the name of the one who seeks vengeance
upon Astoltia.

145062.「決戦の日は そう遠くない。 \n どうか これからも 鍛錬に励んでほしい。\n:
The day of that decisive battle is soon
approaching. Please continue to train hard.
Come on! Hold high the Crest of Justice!

145063.<pc>は 正義の紋章を空高く かかげた。:
<pc> holds high the Crest of
Justice.

145064.「うん。強くやさしい きみらしい正義だ。\n 闘戦士 <pc>の 正義のチカラ。:
Yes...your justice is strong, yet gentle.
I without a doubt feel your righteous power.

145065.「我が 乙女たちに導かれ\n 高潔なる闘戦士 現れし時\n 聖光届きて 我 道標:
Guided by our maidens, when the noble warrior
appears, may the sacred light reach us and be
our beacon of hope...!

145066.「勇気 慈愛 英知 希望が示す\n 闘戦士 <pc>の 正義のチカラよ\n ……:
The power of justice, shown by your courage,
kindness, wisdom, and hope... Now, let it
open the way to your next path!

145067.「<pc>。\n これで 僕の役目もおわりだ。 \n 短い間だったけど お別れの:
With this, my role is completed.
Though our time together was short,
it's time to say goodbye.

145068.「僕は 聖光のチカラを たくわえるために\n また眠らなきゃ。\n 来たるべき:
I must sleep once more to gather the power
of the sacred light. When the time is right,
we will meet once more.
